about_the_game:
The Soundtrack for Luckslinger (does not include bonus tracks)

Track list:

  • 1. Luckslinger - Fistful of Fortune
  • 2. Luckslinger - Luckslinger's Theme
  • 3. Luckslinger - Bullets & Beats
  • 4. Luckslinger - Melancholy
  • 5. Luckslinger - His name was Sean
  • 6. Luckslinger - Save it for the cave
  • 7. Luckslinger - Wrong side of the tracks
  • 8. Luckslinger - Blind man in the desert
  • 9. Luckslinger - The Hed's House
  • 10. Luckslinger - Puppets
  • 11. Luckslinger - All set and done
  • 12. Luckslinger - Lucky number six
  • 13. Luckslinger - Ecstasy of luck
  • 14. Luckslinger - Family values
  • 15. Luckslinger - Letters from Clovercreek
  • 16. Luckslinger - Praise the odds
  • 17. Luckslinger - Bumshuffle
  • 18. Luckslinger - Clovercreek
  • 19. Luckslinger - D.R.E.A.M
  • 20. Luckslinger - Mallard with the tattooed wings
  • 21. Luckslinger - Elevator

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS or later
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 or later
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
